plot: An elderly couple revisit early childhood memories as they screen cine films from the 1930s, including a short play performed by one of the narrators.
plot_en: An elderly couple revisit early childhood memories as they screen cine films from the 1930s, including a short play performed by one of the narrators.
plot_es: An elderly couple revisit early childhood memories as they screen cine films from the 1930s, including a short play performed by one of the narrators.
title: 3MW: Storytelling
